message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this product for $16,000. I think it will be incredibly valuable for you, and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have.
I'm really interested in the product, but $16,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $16,000 represents the value I place on the product, I understand you have budgetary considerations.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $13,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
